Amperity | Seattle, WA | ONSITE | Full-time

Amperity is hiring engineers across all levels.

Interesting problems:

- Ingesting and cleaning large amounts of data daily and blending it with real-time events

- Automatically stitching data together across disparate systems by training machine-learning models to build a probabilistic identity graph

- Taking research algorithms and productionizing them for high-scale usage

- Allowing users to perform complex, real-time queries across an aggregated view of their data

- Publishing query result data to a diverse set of systems for client usage

We're using Clojure/ClojureScript and all the modern big data tech goodies you'd expect of a 2-year-old company.

Apply at https://amperity.com/careers/ or reach out to me directly with questions. My email prefix matches my HN handle.
